sn47.95-104:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam uddhambhagiyanam samyojananam abhinnaya parinnaya parikkhayaya pahanaya cattaro satipatthana bhavetabba.
sn47.95-104:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.95-104:2.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.95-104:2.6: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam uddhambhagiyanam samyojananam abhinnaya parinnaya parikkhayaya pahanaya ime cattaro satipatthana bhavetabba”ti.
